Articles.Content:
I've checked the settings and the config files but at the moment there is no way to change the right click with anything else (like the left one).

This could be handy if u have a laptop and you play on the go without a mouse (because most of the times i don't have a proper desk)

Could be possible to have a little more control on this subject?

I even tried to set up the mouse buttons for something else but it's not possible at the moment.
